io.ktor.routing

类 RoutingResolveContext

  • io.ktor.routing.RoutingResolveContext

  • public class RoutingResolveContext

    Represents a context in which routing resolution is being performed

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RoutingResolveContext(Route routing, ApplicationCall call)
      Represents a context in which routing resolution is being performed

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RoutingResolveContext

        public RoutingResolveContext(Route routing,
                             ApplicationCall call)

        Represents a context in which routing resolution is being performed

        参数:
        routing - root node for resolution to start at
        call - instance of interface ApplicationCall to use during resolution
